pros: Mobbing attack has long horizontal range
Very good 5th Job skills that change playstyle
Has the ability to transform into a SUPER SAIYAN!
Has increased inventory space from Master of Organization
cons: Has micromanagement especially in 5th Job with Energy

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: +35% + (60% against stunned enemies) + (20% against bosses)
Crit Damage: +15% + (up to 40% from Power Unity buff)
Damage: +15% + (25% when Pirate's Revenge is active)
Chance to ignore all enemy DEF: +40%

buffInfo.active: , , ,
buffInfo.buffCd: (480 - 180s cd), (240s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (180s cd), (180s cd ), (70 - 64s cd)
buffInfo.iFrame: (Situational), (180s cd, during Energy Orb cast), (90s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Pirate to reach Master Level
The stats are affected by %Stat bonuses

[Note]: Link Skill has a togglable effect where you can swap all STR + %STR into DEX + %DEX and vice versa
  • Double-click the Link Skill to turn this effect on/off
  • The effect only applies to the original Link Skill, not the transferred version

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Pirate, fancy and unique' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Pirate, talk to Kyrin to accept a quest called 'Brawler of the High Seas'. Completing the quest will make you a Brawler and you will be on the path to a Buccaneer. Brawler is the 2nd job of Buccaneer

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> - >
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
Option 1

  • Double Down - Saving Grace and Addition
  • Octopunch - Boss Rush and Extra Strike
  • Buccaneer Blast - Extra Strike

Option 2

  • Octopunch - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Extra Strike
  • Buccaneer Blast - Reinforce and Extra Strike

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Subluxe for their help in making this overview!

extraContent.title: Energy Charge
extraContent.content: Buccaneers have a special resource called 'Energy' that they gain in 2nd Job. When your Energy is fully charged, you gain increased stats and access to special versions of previous skills

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.desc: Perform a kick in front of you
Shoots two bullets at one enemy
Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.desc: Double-tap the left or right Arrow Keys to start sprinting
details: Sprinting increases Movement Speed and Jump
While sprinting, you cannot be knocked back

primary.desc: Releases a tornado forward damaging enemies it passes through

details: Shares the same Key Slot and Skill Points as
Charged version travels further

primary.desc: A special resource that generates whenever you attack
details:
Once you are fully charged, you gain increased Movement Speed and DEF
  • You gain half the Movement Speed and DEF while charging

Certain skills gain special abilities when you are fully charged
  • Some of these abilities consume Energy and can only be used when fully charged

primary.desc: Punches forward
details: Can be linked with Octopunch (4th Job)

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Using now propels you forward
details: Additionally increases the effects of
The dash is similar to Mechanic's Mechanical Dash

primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of

Can be linked with to instantly dash to an enemy
  • Linking will not put Spiral Assault on cooldown

primary.desc: Releases a burst of energy in front of you
details: Attack has a chance to stun enemies
Shares the same Key Slot and Skill Points as
Charged version is faster and has a larger range
Increases maximum Energy and amount charged per attack
Energy charges twice as fast against bosses

Grants flat Attack when charged
  • You gain half the Attack while charging

primary.desc: Releases a shockwave in front of you
details: When is fully charged, attack gains increased %Damage

primary.desc: Grants a buff depending on the number rolled
details: [One]: Nothing
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.desc: Unleashes a barrage of punches at a single enemy

details: Shares the same Key Slot and Skill Points as
Charged version has increased number of lines and a larger range

primary.desc: Strikes nearby enemies in front of you and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage
Can only be used when Energy is fully charged

primary.desc: Launches a massive attack that hits a large area while also granting you a buff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Final Attack Buff]: Using , , , , Serpent Vortex, Howling Fist has a chance to deal an additional attack

primary.desc: Releases a blast of energy forward

details: Shares the same Key Slot and Skill Points as
Charged version has increased %Damage and a larger range
[Note]: There is a mistranslation in the tooltip, the buff provides %Attack boost instead of %Damage

primary.desc: Resets the cooldown of all skills below 5th Job (including Beginner skills) unless stated otherwise
details: Unaffected by cooldown resets
Excludes Hyper Skills and skills provided from items like Firestarter Ring, Breath of Divinity, or Lucid Earrings
Party members who received Time Leap's effects previously have a cooldown (180 secs) before the effects can be applied again

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once
Increases amount of Energy charged per attack
Increases the amount of Attack, Movement Speed and DEF gained while charged

primary.desc: When damaged, you have a chance to take reduced damage and gain a %Damage buff
details: Can also be triggered by %Max HP attacks
Can only trigger once every second
Additionally, permanently increases the %Damage of and
Applies to bosses as well
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Boss Damage

hyperActive.desc: Releases a blast of energy that damages nearby enemies and grants a stacking buff
details: [Passive]: Increases %Crit Damage (up to 4 stacks)

fifthMain.name: Meltdown
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000
Duration: 75 sec, Final Damage (when fully charged): +25%.
Can use up to 3 energy orbs, energy orb will periodically deal 900% damage 3 times on up to 10 enemies with +50% Critical Rate and +50% Monster DEF Ignored
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Transforms into a special form where you gain increased %Final Damage
details:
While transformed, you can use Meltdown again to release a giant energy ball (up to 2 times)
  • Energy ball has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore DEF
  • Energy ball is unaffected by Damage Reflect
  • You are invincible while throwing energy ball
While transformed, you can double-tap an arrow key to teleport in that direction

fifthMain.name: Lord of the Deep
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, consumes 60 energy per sec, consumes additional 85 energy per attack, energy consumption decreases by 70% when attacking boss monsters.\nAutomatically attacks up to 10 enemies dealing 710% damage 3 times.\nCooldown: 3 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a rotating serpent around you that damages nearby enemies
details:
Consumes energy every second and whenever Lord of the Deep hits an enemy
  • Consumes reduced Energy against bosses

fifthMain.name: Serpent Vortex
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, Uses 1 Force of the Ocean
Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 10, damage increased by 30% when attacking a boss
1 Force of the Ocean is recharged every 10 sec, and you can hold up to 6 at a time.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Dashes towards a chosen direction while damaging enemies in your path
details: Uses a special resource called 'Ocean Force' which is gained every 10 secs (up to 6 at a time)

fifthMain.name: Howling Fist
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, Energy Cost: 1750
By collecting power, periodically attack up to 8 enemies, for 850% damage, 6 time(s)
The strike will activate a series of additional shocks, attacking 15 enemies, for 1050% damage, 10 time(s) per shock. 14 shock(s) will occur.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Slowly charges for a devastating punch attack
details: Both the charge and punch attack deal damage
You are invincible once the punch attack executes

meta: Buccaneer is a STR pirate class part of the Explorers class group. Buccaneers have a special resource called 'Energy' that they gain in 2nd Job. When you fully charge your Energy, you gain increased stats and gain access to special skills that consume Energy
